downloadMessage.message: Download iCloud for Windows to use iCloud Passwords.

extDescription.message: iCloud Passwords lets you use your passwords created in Safari and apps on iPhone, iPad and Mac with Chrome on Windows.

CheckEngineMessage.message: Enable Passwords in iCloud for Windows to use iCloud Passwords with Chrome.

unsupportedOS.message: This extension is designed to run on Windows 10. If you are using a Mac, your passwords will automatically sync with your iPhone, iPad and Mac when you sign in to iCloud.

divPINMessage.message: iCloud for Windows sent you a notification with a verification code. Enter the code to continue.

divICsMessage.message: Choose a saved password to use:

GenericPopupTitle.message: Your passwords are synced with iCloud Keychain

divNoPasswordsMessage.message: You can view and edit saved passwords in the iCloud Password Manager app.

divDoNotRememberTitle.message: You previously indicated to never save passwords for this website.

divDoNotRememberMessage.message: To change this, remove the entry for this website from your iCloud Keychain and log in to this website again.

ErrorReturned.message: An error occurred. Please re-enable iCloud Passwords extension for Chrome.

enableAutoFillPasswordsMessage.message: Click the toolbar button to enable the iCloud Passwords extension for Chrome.
